TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void RoutedPropertyChangedEventHandler<T>(object sender, RoutedPropertyChangedEventArgs<T> e);
.class public auto ansi sealed RoutedPropertyChangedEventHandler`1<T> extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub RoutedPropertyChangedEventHandler(Of T)(sender As Object, e As RoutedPropertyChangedEventArgs(Of T))
generic <typename T> public delegate void RoutedPropertyChangedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, RoutedPropertyChangedEventArgs<T> ^ e);

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 屬性值的類型，其會報告該值的變更。

span.span: The type of the property value where changes in value are reported.

param.name: sender
param.span: 附加事件處理常式的物件。

span.span: The object where the event handler is attached.

param.name: e
param.span: 特定事件定義將會限制 為某類型，其中條件約束的型別參數符合委派實作的型別參數條件約束。

span.span: Specific event definitions will constrain to a type, with the type parameter of the constraint matching the type parameter constraint of a delegate implementation.

summary.span: 表示將處理各種追蹤屬性值變更之路由事件的方法。

span.span: Represents methods that will handle various routed events that track property value changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用類型條件約束委派的事件的範例根據包含和。Examples of events that use type-constrained delegates based on include and . ## Examples 下列範例定義，並將附加的處理常式方法事件。The following example defines and attaches a handler method for the event. 此處理常式根據，而定義在程式碼範例，具有限制為泛型型別參數的第二個區段。The handler is based on , and is defined in the second segment of the code example, with the type parameter of the generic constrained to . [!code-csharp[AutoGrid#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/AutoGrid/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#2)] [!code-vb[AutoGrid#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/AutoGrid/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#2)] [!code-csharp[AutoGrid#RoutedPropertyChangedEvent](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/AutoGrid/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#routedpropertychangedevent)] [!code-vb[AutoGrid#RoutedPropertyChangedEvent](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/AutoGrid/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#routedpropertychangedevent)] 此特定範例不使用路由事件的特性事件。在相同的元素，會引發此事件在處理事件。This particular example does not use the routed-event characteristic of the event; the event is handled on the same element that it is raised on. 這不一定大小寫。This is not always the case. 路由事件，很可能的事件來源為不同的物件與附加的處理常式的物件。For a routed event, it is possible that the source of the event is a different object than the object where the handler is attached.
